title: Never Let Me Go
overview: Never Let Me Go follows an intense story about love that blossoms in the middle of a power struggle.Â  Nuengdiao and his mother, Tanya, are in great danger after his father was shot to death. Palm is suddenly selected to be Nuengdiao's bodyguard. When his duty and heart are in conflict, what will Palm choose to do? How deep will the relationship between these two young men grow?
